data.title: Most frequent letter
data.statement:
The task is to write a program that takes a string as input and <<finds the most frequently occurring letter in the string>>, only letters. 

The program should then print the most frequent letter, followed by the <<number of times it appears in the string>>. 

The string will <<always have one most frequent letter>>.

It is <<case insensitive>>, so 'A' and 'a' are the same.

data.outputDescription: The <<most frequent letter>> of the string, <<followed by the number of times>> it appears in the string. It must be <<space separated>> and the character <<be in lowercase>>.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

The task is to write a program that takes a string as input and finds the most frequently occurring letter in the string, only letters.

The program should then print the most frequent letter, followed by the number of times it appears in the string.

The string will always have one most frequent letter.

It is case insensitive, so 'A' and 'a' are the same.
Input
str: The string.
Output
The most frequent letter of the string, followed by the number of times it appears in the string. It must be space separated and the character be in lowercase.
Constraints
str will always have one most frequent letter.
0 < length(str) <=1000
Example
Input
Hello World
Output
l 3
